Description: kind of layer into RB. Layer ontology describes data domain - Reactive Box and other elements of this entity
Array with all collection of layer
Collection contains geo attributes or not
domain of context of this layer (can be: MOBILITY - HEATING - ELECTRICITY or others)
sector or context into a specific domain (in context of MOBILITY could be: PUBLIC TRANSPORT - TRAFFIC)
context into a specific subdomain (in PUBLIC TRANSPORT could be BUS SERVICE - METRO - TRAIN)
label or public name of layer
URL of Reactive Box who this layer is produced
